entries.title: Web & App Developer (Intership)
entries.description: My mission was to develop a professional networking application based on an existing application. I used Node.js and Express.js (Typescript-Sequelize, MongoDB), Ionic with Vue.js 3 + Tailwindcss, as well as several useful packages and dependencies. The application has not been deployed yet.

entries.title: Fullstack Developer
entries.description: I passed a diploma of fullstack web developer where I was able to perfect all my necessary techniques in front-end and back-end development of a website. Next to the courses, I specialized myself in web and mobile application development using Node.js with Typescript and the stack MEVNS (MongoDB, Express.js, Vue.js, Node.js, Sequelize).

entries.title: Recruitment and Sales Manager
entries.description: I was in charge of recruiting and placing temporary staff in partner companies. I had to manage the schedule of temporary workers in place in companies, manage appointments, interviews, and I had to be responsive to companies' needs.

entries.title: Customer Service
entries.description: After finishing my degree in Graphic Design, I joined Cube agency in London in 2014 and worked on projects for companies such as Nestle, Spotify and Red Cabbage.

entries.title: DJ/Producer & Lightjockey
entries.description: I spent a BTS in musical and scenic animation in Lyon, and in parallel I was alternating in Paris in an artist booking agency, where I was DJ resident of several establishments, and also technician sound and light for public and private events.
